original_title: Pressure and the Press: The Making of 'All the President's Men'
overview: Hoffman, Redford, Bernstein, Woodward, Pakula and Bradlee. Creators and creatures involved in one way or another with 'All the President's Men', whether being the novel or the movie, appear in this documentary to talk about the challenge of both medias and how one was successfully transformed into another.
title: Pressure and the Press: The Making of 'All the President's Men'
